text: Enathu Bailey bridge was a Bailey bridge made by Indian Army through Kallada River in Enathu, Pathanamthitta district, Kerala. The bridge opened to the public on 10 April, 2017. The bridge is 54.50-metre-long 3.5 metres wide. In September 2017, the Indian Army dismantled the Bailey bridge, after the maintenance of Enathu Bridge was completed.. ==References== Category:Bridges in Asia Category:Transport in India
title: Enathu Bailey bridge
